alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 8:23AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Pushmataha, Choctaw and southeastern Le Flore Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 823 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Albion to Soper. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Hugo... Antlers... Boswell... Fort Towson... Sawyer... Rattan... Soper... Octavia... Snow... Big Cedar... Hugo Lake State Park... Kellond... Kent... Goodland... Messer... Raymond Gary State Park... Nashoba... Oleta... Cloudy... Grant... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
